actionTemplate.title: Shift eyeshadow forward for wide-set eyes
steps: Place the main color closer to the inner corner
Blend toward the nose bridge and socket softly
Layer depth: darker near lash line, lighter toward socket
Keep front-socket blending subtle; avoid a hard block
Finish with a small inner-corner highlight if desired

rationaleTemplate: Forward placement visually brings eyes closer together
Soft front blending avoids making the nose area look dirty
